total_revenue.context: Alphabet consolidated revenue as reported for Q1 2025.

google_services.context: Google Services revenue led by Search & other, YouTube ads, subscriptions, and devices.

google_cloud.context: Growth driven by GCP, AI infrastructure, and generative AI demand with a 17% operating margin.

other_bets.context: Other Bets revenue and loss reflecting ongoing investment.

operating_margin.context: GAAP operating margin for Q1 grew two points to 34%.

net_income.context: Net income and EPS improvements tied to strong top-line performance and non-marketable equity gains.

capex.context: CapEx directed primarily to technical infrastructure (servers, data centers, networking).

free_cash_flow.context: Free cash flow for the quarter; trailing twelve months figure noted in release.

combined.context: YouTube and Google One paid subscriptions surpassed 270 million globally.

youtube_shorts.context: Q1 2025 year-over-year engaged views growth for Shorts.

cloud_margins.context: Google Cloud operating margin reflecting improved efficiency.

waymo.context: Waymo now serving over 250K paid passenger trips weekly, up 5x y/y.

ai_product_innovation.description: Gemini 2.5, Imagen 3, Veo 2, Assistant upgrades, and Android/Pixel AI capabilities illustrate the AI roadmap.
highlights: AI Overviews on 1.5B monthly users and AI Mode rollout
Gemini Live camera/screen sharing and Circle to Search on 250M+ devices
Agent developer kit, Agent Space, Duet AI copilots, and AI Studio adoption +200%

cloud_and_infrastructure.description: Heavy focus on infrastructure with TPUs, GPUs, AI Hypercomputers, and expanded data center footprint.

ecosystem.description: Advertising products plus YouTube Shorts and NFL Sunday Ticket partnerships drive demand.

capex_guidance.context: Full-year 2025 CapEx expectation with the majority in technical infrastructure.

dividends.context: Quarterly cash dividend increased by 5%, payable June 16, 2025.

authorization.context: New share repurchase authorization announced on April 23, 2025.

guidance_comments.revenue: Q2 may reflect normalization after financial services strength and cloud timing-driven variability
guidance_comments.expenses: Depreciation will accelerate as CapEx growth works through, but efficiency workstreams continue

operating_environment_challenges: Managing elevated CapEx while keeping productivity efforts on track
Responding to advertiser mix shifts and geopolitical impacts on ad budgets
Balancing depreciation growth with margin expansion
Guiding through macro uncertainty while investing in AI infrastructure
